class="stub-column large-stub-margin"> <a nz-dropdown nzTrigger="click" [nzDropdownMenu]="menu" class="tag"> Active Contact <i nz-icon nzType="down"></i> </a> <nz-dropdown-menu #menu="nzDropdownMenu"> <ul nz-menu nzSelectable> <li nz-menu-item>1st menu item</li> <li nz-menu-item>2nd menu item</li> <li nz-menu-item>3rd menu item</li> <li nz-menu-item nzDanger>4th danger item</li> </ul> item</li> </ul> </nz-dropdown-menu> </div> </sc-stub> <sc-stub [scStubSize]="enumStubSize.Small" [scShowLink]="false" (scLinkClick)="onClick()"> <div class="stub-field">{{ data[0] }}</div> <div nzTrigger="click" [nzDropdownMenu]="menu" class="tag small-stub-marging"> Active Contact <i nz-icon nzType="down"></i> </a> <nz-dropdown-menu #menu="nzDropdownMenu"> <ul nz-menu nzSelectable> <li nz-menu-item>1st menu item</li> <li nz-menu-item>2nd menu item</li> <li nz-menu-item>3rd menu item</li> <li nz-menu-item nzDanger>4th danger item</li> </ul> </nz-dropdown-menu> </div> </sc-stub> <br /> <h4>Empty Small Stub</h4> <sc-stub [scStubSize]="enumStubSize.Small" [scShowLink]="false"> </sc-stub> </div> `, styles: [ ` .stub-column { flex: 1; display: flex; flex-direction: column; min-width: 0; } .large-stub-margin { margin-right: 24px; } .stub-field { height: 20px; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; } .stub-title { font-weight: 500; } .small-stub-marging { margin-left: 8px; } .stub-divider { border-left: #dce0e8 solid 1px; height: 16px; } `, ], }) export class NzDemoStubExamplesComponent { public enumStubSize = StubSize; public data = [ 'Yukiko Yoriguchi', 'Placement Type: Temporary', 'Company: Apply Recruitment', 'Job Owner: Uche Ogbonna', ]; public onClick(): void { alert('Link is clicked'); } }

`, styles: [ ` .stub-column { flex: 1; display: flex; flex-direction: column; min-width: 0; } .large-stub-margin { margin-right: 24px; } .stub-field { height: 20px; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; } .stub-title { font-weight: 500; } .small-stub-marging { margin-left: 8px; } .stub-divider { border-left: #dce0e8 solid 1px; height: 16px; } `, ], }) export class NzDemoStubExamplesComponent { public enumStubSize = StubSize; public data = [ 'Yukiko Yoriguchi', 'Placement Type: Temporary', 'Company: Apply Recruitment', 'Job Owner: Uche Ogbonna', ]; public onClick(): void { alert('Link is clicked'); } }
